title: Completely Normal Piano

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities cannot be used by you. If a Coven member visits you, they can use your abilities, and they can choose to not have the effects of their ability apply to you. Note that you still choose targets, but the member chooses the ability.
- You will always be the last one to receive the Necronomicon. If you're the last Coven alive, you receive it immediately, even if it's not Night 3.
- With the Necronomicon, you can *finally* use your abilities by yourself.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Play a lullaby. The target and all visitors at the target are roleblocked.
- Play a scary song. The target reveals their role.
- Play an angry song. The target will deal a basic attack with their ability. If the ability already is attacking, the attack power is increased by one. It will show the cause of death as by the target's role.
- Mash the piano keys. The target and their visitors fucking die. 2 uses without the Necronomicon, unlimited with it.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose the Coven.

desc:
Post 3813
*And here we have our piano. Some of us like to play songs on it.*
*Oh cool! Is it a magic piano?*
*Nope, it's completely normal.*
*...why?*
